alligator 0.5.1¶

date:2015-01-01

This was a bugfix release that corrected some packaging issues with Alligator 0.5.0.

Features¶

  • None

Bugfixes¶

  • Fixed a packaging error that resulted in none of the backends being included. (SHA:0e00b3b)
